message: Let's split it evenly to start, Bob!
I'll take the majority, but I'll give you a small share
Meet me in the middle, Bob!
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm still in the lead
Time to turn the tables, Bob!
I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I'm still trying to get the majority
Time to make a move, Bob!
I'll give you a bigger share, but I'm still trying to get a decent amount
